Audio Description: Black and white pictures of two teenagers dominate this poster. In the right foreground is the head of a smiling teenage boy. His thick dark hair is combed back and his collar is open. In the left background is a dark-haired smiling teenage girl. The photos of the youths are superimposed over a white and blue sky and above a scene in black and white of people harvesting a field. Front and center at the bottom is a woman pouring heads of lettuce into a wooden barrel. To her right is another woman taking lettuce from furrowed rows and placing them in a basket. Behind her are other people working in the field. In the left background is a horse hitched to a farm implement with men working nearby. In yellow print at the top of the poster are the words: “Be a Victory Farm Volunteer in the U.S. Crop Corps.” At the bottom of the poster in yellow letters are the words: “See your principal.”
Creator: United States. Department of Agriculture
